metadata.title: Northeast Pacific Multibeam Database (PMEL Vents)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program

metadata.description: Bathymetric data were collected from different seafloor survey systems.  Coverage is limited.  For topological data on land, especially in small-scale, use DBDB5.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To monitor the global ocean through underwater acoustics.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
